title: 820-3435-b no backlight, fuse keeps blowing
message:
PPBUS G3H 8.6
VOLTAGE ON LCD BACKLIGHT BOOST 39V 
CHANGED BACKLIGHT IC, NO LUCK. NOT SURE WHAT I AM MISSING.
any suggestions are welcomed. 
(did find a few resistors on PPVIN_S0SW_LCDBKLT that do not measure in ohms correctly, but i replaced them (and measured before i did) and its almost like they measure incorrectly only when on this board.
board is water damaged, and yes ive confirmed its the backlight, and its not the lcd i tested it with a known working lcd .

title: 820-3435-b no backlight, fuse keeps blowing
message: 39V you should have backlight. Also if there is 39V the fuse is good, so when does it blow?

title: 820-3435-b no backlight, fuse keeps blowing
message:
Its blowing randomly as far as i can tell. ive had to replace it 3-4x already
just looked inside the connector with the microscope, its burnt out on the inside. around the backlight pins.

title: 820-3435-b no backlight, fuse keeps blowing
message: Replace connector and inspect cable for damage too.
